author: Lauren Alexis Fisher
title: Best Celebrity Instagrams From 2017 ‚Äì Celeb Selfies and Instagram Pictures of Academy Awards
text:
As everyone keeps a close eye on tonight's best red carpet looks, don't forget to keep up with all the behind-the-scenes Oscars moments spotted on Instagram too. From prepping for the red carpet to the backstage scene, consider these A-List Instagrams your VIP pass into the biggest awards show of the year. Josephine Skriver gets glam in Victoria's Secret:
Glam squad in action! @josephineskriver getting red carpet-ready in the Dream Angels Demi. üíÑüíÖüèª üíã#Oscars #VFOscarParty
A post shared by Victoria's Secret (@victoriassecret) on Feb 26, 2017 at 2:00pm PST
 Naomie Harris preps for the Oscars with a facial:
Preparations for the #oscars begin early with a facial by @teresatarmey ! A moment to relax and reflect before the glamour and mayhem begins!!!
A post shared by Naomie Harris (@naomieharris) on Feb 26, 2017 at 7:18am PST
